function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased hunting and harvesting pressure on domestic animals and wildlife due to COVID-related societal changes","Impact":"Loss of biodiversity and disruption of ecosystems","Mitigation":"Implementing regulations to limit hunting and harvesting, and promoting conservation efforts","Technologies":"Sustainable tracking and monitoring technologies","People":"Domestic animals, wildlife","Owner":"Government, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Postponement or cancellation of research, monitoring, and training/education programs in the conservation sector due to global reduction in mobility","Impact":"Reduced conservation efforts and knowledge gaps","Mitigation":"Utilizing remote research and monitoring technologies, and rescheduling programs","Technologies":"Remote sensing, remote monitoring systems","People":"Conservation scientists, practitioners","Owner":"Research institutions, government, NGOs"},{"Description":"Declines in travel and tourism revenue affecting conservation funding","Impact":"Reduced funding for conservation projects and initiatives","Mitigation":"Exploring alternative funding sources, such as online engagement and crowdfunding","Technologies":"Online engagement platforms, crowdfunding platforms","People":"Conservation organizations, researchers","Owner":"Charities, research institutions"}]}
